Package com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows

Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Flows.SuccessCapture<V>
    The second stage of a fluent API for defining branching Flows that respond to success/failure of the previous flow.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BranchBuilder<T>
    Provides a Fluent API for constructing Branching flows, deferring specification of the default branch to the final step.
    FailureKeyCapture
    Part of the fluent API for defining flows that recover from failures.
    Flows
    Provides the public API for constructing flows.
    InputKeysCapture
    The stage in the Fluent API where we have captured the input keys to supply to a Flow.
    OutputKeysCapture<T>
    The stage in the fluent API where we have captured the input and output keys of a Flow.
    RecoveryResultKeyCapture<T>
    Part of the fluent API for creating Flows that recover from a failure.
    SourceTargetCapture1<A,OUTPUT>
    The stage in the fluent API where we have captured the target key and single source key of a Flow.
    SourceTargetCapture2<A,B,OUTPUT>
    The stage in the fluent API where we have captured the target key and two source keys of a Flow.
    SourceTargetCapture3<A,B,C,OUTPUT>
    The stage in the fluent API where we have captured the target key and three source keys of a Flow.
    TargetCapture<OUTPUT>
    The stage in the fluent API where we have captured the output Key to which a Flow will write its result.

Package com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows Description

Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
